TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RunatServerRegex extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex

Docs.summary: Provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET attribute.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RunatServerRegex class provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET `runat="server"` attribute.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
